comments:
Hello,
This error happens when I try to open a trac item in my task list, after having connected mylar to a trac 0.10 repository and set up a query. The task page appears after an error dialog is shown, but with only the "Planning" tab.  I have few applications running, and lots of free memory. I can also open many tickets at once, and the error will appear for all of them, and all will show with the planning tab.

Please let me know if there's anything else I can help with.


-- Error Log --
